ygData.subject: Re: Mistmoore Raid
ygData.msgSnippet: I did get the Lute but it took Moonflower Bllue some 4 days and 5 deaths to do it. It didn t take long in the zone auctioning and tell to high levels to hear
ygData.messageBody:
I did get the Lute but it took Moonflower Bllue some 4 days and 5
deaths to do it. It didn't take long in the zone auctioning and "tell"
to high levels to hear that old refrain "Why sure honey, we just
destroyed (insert number) of the things because no Bard was around. You
come and get the next one." Moon figures she better know the way so
whips out here lute, through the tunnel, up the ramp and into the
castle. After a short trip, there is the piano room. No problem. On the
way back, suddenly "You dare challenge the Might of Mistmoor..."
"loading....." Now to make a long story short Moon WAS able to drag her
body from BETWEEN the LEGS OF A WILL SAPPER" while invis'd. Hands
shaking she put her stuff in the bank and 3 days later some high levels
killed a musician at the zone of all places and she got her lute. My
best guess is that LAG was the culprit in invisibility failing the first
time but I can't rule out the Will Sapper being buffed to see
invisibility one time and not the second.
Bad zone ..yes, but for me the scariest is lower Guk. That
"invisibility" to the dead spell goes down at the darndest times... Moon
died 3 times yesterday just getting to the executioners room there. Give
me a song any day !!! and I want an Invis to Undead song now !!!!! :)

Moonflower Bllue, Bard of the 32nd Song
Cazic-Thule
